content: 3 counts as first double_crochet chain 2 skip 1 treble_crochet double_crochet in band knit with size 8 needles next treble_crochet chain 2 skip 1 treble_crochet to end of round slip_stitch join in top of first chain 3 54 sts total 18 double_crochet + 36 chain start-up round ​ transfer loop from crochet hook to knitting needle insert needle through next single_crochet and round 5 chain 1 2 single_crochet in same st as join single_crochet in each of pick up a stitch to end of round place a stitch ​ next 8 sts 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 8 sts to end of marker and begin working in the round 72 sts round slip_stitch join in first single_crochet 60 sts total 60 single_crochet rounds 1-8 k1 p1 to end of round ​ round 6 ​ chain 4 counts as first treble_crochet treble_crochet in next 3 single_crochet 2 treble_crochet in finishing with size 10 needle next single_crochet treble_crochet in next 4 single_crochet 2 treble_crochet in next st to end of round slip_stitch join in top of first chain 4 bind off all stitches in pattern 70 sts total 70 treble_crochet weave in ends round 7 chain 3 counts as first double_crochet chain 1 skip 1 double_crochet in next ​ treble_crochet chain 1 skip 1 to end of round slip_stitch join in top of first chain 3 72 sts total 36 double_crochet + 36 chain space size m and l only round 8 work 2 slip_stitch into first chain space this position is ​ the new beginning of the round chain 3 counts as first ​​ double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in next chain space chain 1 to end of round slip_stitch join in top of first chain 3 72 sts total 36 double_crochet + 36 chain space size l only round 9 repeat round 8 ​ all sizes s m and l round 10 chain 1 single_crochet in same st as join 1 single_crochet in next chain space ​ 1 single_crochet in each double_crochet and 1 single_crochet in each chain space to end of round slip_stitch join in first single_crochet 72 sts total 72 single_crochet round 11 chain 4 counts as first treble_crochet treble_crochet in each single_crochet to end ​ of round slip_stitch join in top of first chain 4 72 sts total 72 treble_crochet round 12 chain 1 single_crochet in same st as join single_crochet in each treble_crochet to ​ end of round slip_stitch join in first single_crochet 72 sts total 72 single_crochet © 2020 amanda skinner strangeknits com 2 ​
